long_description: The Outdoor Research Bug Net(TM) cap features no-see-um netting stashed in the back of the cap and ready to be deployed when bugs start biting. No-see-um netting keeps mosquitoes, flies and other insects at bay without the use of chemicals; netting won't interfere with your vision. Drawcord closure secures the bottom of the netting to keep the bugs out. Stash the netting in the pocket at the back of the cap when it's not needed. Outdoor Research Bug Net(TM) cap is made with Supplex(R) nylon fabric that provides UPF 30 protection from the sun. Polyester sweatband helps move moisture off your brow. Cap weighs 3.1 oz.
short_description: The Outdoor Research Bug Net(TM) cap features no-see-um netting stashed in the back of the cap and ready to be deployed when bugs start biting.
